title: Artist Detail Page Implementation
description: Replace ArtistDetailPage placeholder with comprehensive artist view: bio, upcoming events, past events, stats, related artists. Files: src/pages/ArtistDetailPage.tsx. Acceptance: Production-ready artist detail page with event list, filtering, responsive design, loading states.

title: Calendar Navigation & Filter Integration
description: Add calendar navigation (prev/next month, today button), integrate with existing filter system. Files: src/components/calendar/CalendarControls.tsx. Acceptance: Calendar navigation works smoothly, filters apply to calendar views, date range filters sync with calendar.

title: AI Poster Generation & Content Processing
description: AI-powered poster generation for events without images, image optimization, OCR for metadata extraction. Files: src/signage/ai/PosterGenerator.ts, src/signage/ai/ImageProcessor.ts. Acceptance: Generates backup posters using AI, extracts text from existing posters, optimizes images for display.

title: Agenda/List View Implementation
description: Implement agenda list view as alternative to calendar grid, grouped by date with event details. Files: src/components/calendar/AgendaView.tsx. Acceptance: Agenda view groups events by date, shows more event detail than calendar grid, infinite scroll.

title: Month View Implementation
description: Implement month calendar view with event rendering, day cell customization, event click handling. Files: src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx, src/components/calendar/MonthView.tsx. Acceptance: Month view displays events as colored bars, clicking events opens detail modal, responsive design.

title: Event List Modal Integration
description: Integrate event detail modals into HomePage event cards, ensure smooth transitions and state management. Files: src/components/ui/EventCard.tsx, src/pages/HomePage.tsx. Acceptance: Clicking event cards opens modals, URL updates, modal content matches card data.

title: Language Selector Integration
description: Connect existing language dropdown UI to i18n system, add language persistence and browser detection. Files: src/components/layout/Header.tsx, src/stores/languageStore.ts. Acceptance: Language dropdown changes app language, selection persists across sessions, browser language detected.

title: Performance Optimization Verification
description: Verify virtual scrolling performance with large datasets (1000+ events), optimize memoization and re-render patterns. Files: src/components/ui/VirtualizedEventList.tsx. Acceptance: Smooth scrolling with 2000+ events, React DevTools shows minimal unnecessary re-renders.

title: Shared Modal Infrastructure
description: Create reusable modal components needed by Phase 10 detail pages and Phase 11 event details. Install @radix-ui/react-dialog, create Modal components with punk rock styling, and integrate with state management. This epic blocks both Phase 10 and Phase 11 detail page development.

title: Phase 12 - Digital Signage System
description: Create complete digital signage system for venues with PWA displays, content rotation, venue admin interface, automated poster web scraping, and AI-powered poster generation. This is the largest and most complex phase, completely independent of other phases. Includes web scraping, AI integration, and content management.

title: Content Rotation System
description: Implement configurable content rotation (daily/weekly/monthly views), timing controls, venue-specific scheduling. Files: src/signage/components/RotationController.tsx, src/signage/stores/rotationStore.ts. Acceptance: Rotation timing configurable per venue, smooth transitions between content, emergency override capability.

title: Venue Detail Page Implementation
description: Replace VenueDetailPage placeholder with venue info: address, capacity, policies, upcoming shows, venue photos placeholder. Files: src/pages/VenueDetailPage.tsx. Acceptance: Complete venue detail page with map placeholder, event list, venue policies, contact info.

title: Signage Deployment & Documentation
description: Create deployment guides, venue onboarding documentation, device setup instructions, community support materials. Files: docs/signage/, README-SIGNAGE.md. Acceptance: Complete setup documentation, device compatibility guide, troubleshooting docs, community forum setup.

title: Phase 7 Polish
description: Complete the remaining 5% of Phase 7 to achieve production readiness. Focus on accessibility compliance, edge case testing, and performance optimization for the event list and filtering system.

title: Filter Edge Case Testing & Bug Fixes
description: Test and fix edge cases in filtering: empty results, conflicting filters, URL parameter edge cases, filter state persistence issues. Files: src/stores/filterStore.ts, src/pages/HomePage.tsx. Acceptance: All filter combinations work correctly, no console errors, URL sync handles malformed parameters gracefully.

title: Phase 9 - Multilingual Support
description: Add complete internationalization (i18n) support with react-i18next. Connect existing language dropdown UI to functional translation system, implement AI-powered translation pipeline for 8 languages, and add date/time localization. Language selector UI already exists but needs backend functionality.

title: Venue Admin Interface
description: Create venue admin dashboard for signage configuration, content upload, display settings, branding customization. Files: src/signage/admin/, src/signage/components/AdminDashboard.tsx. Acceptance: Admin can configure display settings, upload logos/graphics, set rotation timing, preview signage remotely.

title: Translation Key Extraction & Base Files
description: Extract all UI text to translation keys, create base English translation file with comprehensive keys. Files: public/locales/en.json, all component files for key replacement. Acceptance: All static text uses translation keys, en.json contains all UI strings, no hardcoded strings remain.

title: Phase 10 - Complete Directory Detail Pages
description: Replace placeholder ArtistDetailPage and VenueDetailPage with comprehensive detail views. Add breadcrumb navigation and improve linking between directory lists and detail pages. Directory listings are already production-ready, need to complete detail page implementations.

title: FullCalendar Installation & Basic Setup
description: Install @fullcalendar/react and required plugins, create base CalendarView component with Zivv styling. Files: package.json, src/components/calendar/CalendarView.tsx. Acceptance: FullCalendar renders with punk rock theme, basic month view functional.

title: Modal State Management Integration
description: Extend appStore with modal state management, URL synchronization for deep-linking to modals. Files: src/stores/appStore.ts. Acceptance: Modal state persists in URL, browser back/forward works with modals, clean state management.

title: Phase 11 - Event Details & Interactions
description: Replace EventDetailPage placeholder with comprehensive event view including interactions like calendar export and social sharing. Integrate event detail modals into existing event cards throughout the application. Focus on complete event information display and user interactions.

title: Accessibility Audit & Fixes
description: Conduct WCAG 2.1 AA compliance audit on VirtualizedEventList, SearchFilterToolbar, and all filter components. Fix keyboard navigation, focus management, and screen reader support. Files: src/components/ui/VirtualizedEventList.tsx, src/components/filters/, src/pages/HomePage.tsx. Acceptance: All filter components pass axe-core accessibility tests, keyboard navigation works throughout, screen readers can operate all filtering.

title: AI Translation Pipeline Implementation
description: Create automated translation workflow using OpenAI API for all 8 languages, build-time translation updates. Files: scripts/translate.js, public/locales/ (all language files). Acceptance: npm run translate command generates all language files, incremental translation updates, quality flags for human review.

title: Phase 8 - Calendar Views
description: Replace CalendarPage placeholder with functional FullCalendar implementation. Create month, week, and agenda views with proper event rendering, navigation, and filter integration. This is independent of other phases and can be developed in parallel after Phase 7 polish.

title: Date/Time Localization
description: Implement locale-specific date/time formatting, currency formatting for ticket prices. Files: src/utils/dateFormatting.ts, src/utils/priceFormatting.ts. Acceptance: Dates display in locale format, prices show appropriate currency symbols, relative dates translated.

title: Event Interaction Features
description: Add calendar export (iCal format), social sharing buttons, ticket link handling with external link warnings. Files: src/components/event/EventActions.tsx, src/utils/calendarExport.ts. Acceptance: iCal download works across devices, social sharing opens native apps, external links have security warnings.

title: Week View Implementation
description: Implement week calendar view with time slots, multi-day events, hour-based layout. Files: src/components/calendar/WeekView.tsx. Acceptance: Week view shows time slots, events positioned correctly, scrollable time range.

title: Install & Configure Modal Library
description: Install @radix-ui/react-dialog, create base Modal component with Zivv styling, implement focus trap and scroll lock. Files: package.json, src/components/ui/Modal.tsx. Acceptance: Reusable Modal component with punk rock styling, proper accessibility, mobile responsive.
close_reason: Modal component completed using native HTML dialog API instead of Radix UI. Provides better performance with all required features: punk rock styling, accessibility, focus trap, scroll lock, and mobile responsive design.

title: Event Detail Page Core Implementation
description: Replace EventDetailPage placeholder with comprehensive event view: full description, lineup, venue details, ticket links, time/date. Files: src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx. Acceptance: Complete event detail page with all event data, responsive design, proper typography for descriptions.

title: Signage Display Application Core
description: Create basic signage PWA with venue-specific display, event rotation, offline capability, kiosk mode support. Files: src/signage/, public/signage-manifest.json. Acceptance: PWA displays venue events, rotates content on timer, works offline, installs on tablets.

title: Directory Navigation Enhancement
description: Add breadcrumb navigation, improve linking between directory lists and detail pages, add 'back to directory' functionality. Files: src/components/layout/Breadcrumbs.tsx, src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx, src/pages/VenuesPage.tsx. Acceptance: Clear navigation paths, breadcrumbs work on mobile, back buttons functional.

title: Create Detail Page Modal Components
description: Create EventDetailModal, ArtistDetailModal, VenueDetailModal components with consistent styling and close behavior. Files: src/components/modals/EventDetailModal.tsx, src/components/modals/ArtistDetailModal.tsx, src/components/modals/VenueDetailModal.tsx. Acceptance: Three modal variants with proper content areas, close buttons, mobile optimization.

title: i18n Library Installation & Configuration
description: Install react-i18next, configure translation loading, create i18n context and provider setup. Files: package.json, src/i18n/index.ts, src/i18n/config.ts. Acceptance: i18n configured with all 8 target languages, context available throughout app.

title: Automated Poster Web Scraping
description: Implement web scraping pipeline for venue websites and social media to automatically extract event posters. Files: src/signage/ingestion/WebScraper.ts, src/signage/ingestion/ContentProcessor.ts. Acceptance: Scrapes Facebook/Instagram/venue sites, detects event posters vs other content, processes multiple venues.
